languages.text: "Думаю, ты и сам{mf||а} видишь, что ничто не было случайностью. И особенно — наша встреча. Поступи я иначе, упрости свое мышление — кто знает, в какой момент нить возможного свернула бы в темные пространства нежеланного?"

"I think you realise yourself that nothing was accidental. Especially not our meeting. If I had chosen differently, if I had simplified my way of thinking, who knows at what moment the thread of possibilities would have taken a turn for the dark spaces of the undesirable?"
languages.original_text: "Думаю, ты и сам{mf||а} видишь, что ничто не было случайностью. И особенно — наша встреча. Поступи я иначе, упрости свое мышление — кто знает, в какой момент нить возможного свернула бы в темные пространства нежеланного?"

traits.locale_text: "I think you realise yourself that nothing was accidental. Especially not our meeting. If I had chosen differently, if I had simplified my way of thinking, who knows at what moment the thread of possibilities would have taken a turn for the dark spaces of the undesirable?"

"I think you realise yourself that nothing was accidental. Especially not our meeting. If I had chosen differently, if I had simplified my way of thinking, who knows at what moment the thread of possibilities would have taken a turn for the dark spaces of the undesirable?"

"I think you realise yourself that nothing was accidental. Especially not our meeting. If I had chosen differently, if I had simplified my way of thinking, who knows at what moment the thread of possibilities would have taken a turn for the dark spaces of the undesirable?"

"I think you realise yourself that nothing was accidental. Especially not our meeting. If I had chosen differently, if I had simplified my way of thinking, who knows at what moment the thread of possibilities would have taken a turn for the dark spaces of the undesirable?"

"I think you realise yourself that nothing was accidental. Especially not our meeting. If I had chosen differently, if I had simplified my way of thinking, who knows at what moment the thread of possibilities would have taken a turn for the dark spaces of the undesirable?"

languages.text: “我相信你也已经意识到了，没有任何事情是偶然的，尤其是我们的相遇。如果我当时做出了不同的选择，如果我简化了我的思维方式，谁知道会不会在某个时刻，概率的丝线会落入令人厌弃的黑暗之中呢？”
languages.original_text: "I think you realise yourself that nothing was accidental. Especially not our meeting. If I had chosen differently, if I had simplified my way of thinking, who knows at what moment the thread of possibilities would have taken a turn for the dark spaces of the undesirable?"

traits.locale_text: “我相信你也已经意识到了，没有任何事情是偶然的，尤其是我们的相遇。如果我当时做出了不同的选择，如果我简化了我的思维方式，谁知道会不会在某个时刻，概率的丝线会落入令人厌弃的黑暗之中呢？”

languages.text: «Creo que se da cuenta de que nada de esto fue un accidente. Y menos nuestro encuentro. Si hubiera elegido otra opción, si hubiera simplificado mis pensamientos, ¿quién sabe en qué momento las probabilidades hubieran tomado un giro hacia lo oscuro y lo indeseable?».
languages.original_text: "I think you realise yourself that nothing was accidental. Especially not our meeting. If I had chosen differently, if I had simplified my way of thinking, who knows at what moment the thread of possibilities would have taken a turn for the dark spaces of the undesirable?"

traits.locale_text: «Creo que se da cuenta de que nada de esto fue un accidente. Y menos nuestro encuentro. Si hubiera elegido otra opción, si hubiera simplificado mis pensamientos, ¿quién sabe en qué momento las probabilidades hubieran tomado un giro hacia lo oscuro y lo indeseable?».

languages.text: 「偶発的なものなど何もなかったと、あなた自身は気づいているはずだ。特に我らの出会いは。もし私が違う選択をしていたら、もし私が自分の考え方を単純化していたら、可能性の糸がいずこか瞬間に望ましくない暗い空間へと転じていたことだろう」
languages.original_text: "I think you realise yourself that nothing was accidental. Especially not our meeting. If I had chosen differently, if I had simplified my way of thinking, who knows at what moment the thread of possibilities would have taken a turn for the dark spaces of the undesirable?"

traits.locale_text: 「偶発的なものなど何もなかったと、あなた自身は気づいているはずだ。特に我らの出会いは。もし私が違う選択をしていたら、もし私が自分の考え方を単純化していたら、可能性の糸がいずこか瞬間に望ましくない暗い空間へと転じていたことだろう」

languages.text: "Ich glaube, Euch ist selbst klar, dass nichts aus Zufall geschehen ist. Ganz besonders unser Aufeinandertreffen nicht. Hätte ich anders entschieden, hätte ich meine Denkweise simplifiziert — wer weiß, in welchem Augenblick der Faden der Möglichkeiten in den dunklen Raum des Unerwünschten abgerutscht wäre."
languages.original_text: "I think you realise yourself that nothing was accidental. Especially not our meeting. If I had chosen differently, if I had simplified my way of thinking, who knows at what moment the thread of possibilities would have taken a turn for the dark spaces of the undesirable?"

traits.locale_text: "Ich glaube, Euch ist selbst klar, dass nichts aus Zufall geschehen ist. Ganz besonders unser Aufeinandertreffen nicht. Hätte ich anders entschieden, hätte ich meine Denkweise simplifiziert — wer weiß, in welchem Augenblick der Faden der Möglichkeiten in den dunklen Raum des Unerwünschten abgerutscht wäre."

languages.text: « Je crois que vous vous rendez bien compte que rien n'était accidentel, et surtout pas notre rencontre. Si j'avais fait des choix différents, si j'avais simplifié mon raisonnement, qui sait à quel moment le fil des possibilités aurait dévié vers les noirs espaces de l'indésirable ? »
languages.original_text: "I think you realise yourself that nothing was accidental. Especially not our meeting. If I had chosen differently, if I had simplified my way of thinking, who knows at what moment the thread of possibilities would have taken a turn for the dark spaces of the undesirable?"

traits.locale_text: « Je crois que vous vous rendez bien compte que rien n'était accidentel, et surtout pas notre rencontre. Si j'avais fait des choix différents, si j'avais simplifié mon raisonnement, qui sait à quel moment le fil des possibilités aurait dévié vers les noirs espaces de l'indésirable ? »

languages.original_text: "I think you realise yourself that nothing was accidental. Especially not our meeting. If I had chosen differently, if I had simplified my way of thinking, who knows at what moment the thread of possibilities would have taken a turn for the dark spaces of the undesirable?"

languages.text: "Sanırım hiçbir şeyin tesadüfi olmadığı fark ediliyordur. Özellikle de karşılaşmış olmamız. Farklı seçimler yapsaydım, düşünce biçimimi basitleştirseydim... İhtimal iplikleri kim bilir ne zaman istenmeyenin karanlığa sapardı?"
languages.original_text: "I think you realise yourself that nothing was accidental. Especially not our meeting. If I had chosen differently, if I had simplified my way of thinking, who knows at what moment the thread of possibilities would have taken a turn for the dark spaces of the undesirable?"

traits.locale_text: "Sanırım hiçbir şeyin tesadüfi olmadığını sen de fark etmişsindir. Özellikle de karşılaşmış olmamız. Farklı seçimler yapsaydım, düşünce biçimimi basitleştirseydim, ihtimaller ipliklerinin istenmeyen şeylerin karanlık alanına doğru meylettiği anın ne zaman karşımıza çıkacağını kim bilebilirdi?"
